mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the Ohio extension of the Norfolk and Western Railroad: showing the location of the coal and timber lands of the Flat-Top Coal Land Association and of the Guyandot Coal Land Association in Virginia and West Virginia, February 1892
Flat-Top & Guyandot

mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 34 x 97 cm. on sheet 42 x 104 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Attributed to office of Jed Hotchkiss. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Hotchkiss C; not in Swem, E.G. Maps relating to Virginia or in Phillips, P.L. Maps of America; handwritten on map verso: Flat-Top & Guyandot [original]
